reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown comfortable, not itchy at all, and appreciate its silky fabric that goes to the knees. The gown receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer noting it's particularly suitable for summer and fall. Customers find it flattering, with one mentioning it accentuates curves in all the right places, and one noting it's sexy without being revealing or constricting. While many find

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Cozy
items.body: I bought this Ekouaer women’s nightgown V-neck as a Christmas gift for my wife, and it was a total hit. She absolutely loves it! The material is super soft and comfortable — perfect for lounging or sleeping. The fit is flattering without being too tight, and the V-neck and button-down style give it a nice, classic look. It washes well and keeps its shape, which is a big plus. My wife liked it so much that she’s already talking about getting another one in a different color. Highly recommend this if you’re looking for a cozy, good-quality sleep shirt that makes a thoughtful gift! Read more
items.author: Dakotah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A night dress just for myself
items.body: I am at a point in my life where I want to wear things to bed which have got nothing to do with how attractive I look to someone else, and everything to do with how I feel in them and how comfortable they are to sleep in. Despite not being cotton (this is almost completely polyester) this night dress is soft, comfortable and I don't get super hot in it. Which, being a certain age, getting hot at night is now more so to do with hormones than other things. But I digress. Which is not to say that I don't want to feel attractive, for myself that is. Remarkably, I really like how this looks on me. It's not overtly sexy, but that's not the look I am going for. More so it's pretty and fits me well - loose without looking like a tent, and it hugs my body in parts without overtly drawing attention to those parts. I like it so much I'm going to order a couple more in different colors. Update: So I went along and ordered another colour - a floral design, and it's cut slightly differently to the black one I talk about in this review. Slightly shorter and also the arm holes are cut a little closer to my arms - which explains someone else's review talking about that. I still really love this product though. Read more
items.author: The Acquirer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Fun — Great as a Gift
items.body: I bought this nightgown as a bridal shower gift, and it was a hit. The fabric is soft, the pattern is fun, and the bride seemed to really like it. A cute and comfortable option for gifting Read more
items.author: HappyLifePNW

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ignore the size chart. Order your usual size!
items.body: I took a gamble and ordered my usual size XS, despite the size chart saying that I would need an M. XS fits, but pretty loosely and comfortably. My bust measures 33”, size chart claims that XS fits a 29” bust. The straps are a bit long on me, but that’ll be good for breastfeeding in a few months. The fabric is super soft and comfortably thick, but still airy. I haven’t slept in it yet, but will update if I get sweaty, which happens often if I get too warm. Good buy for the money overall. Read more
items.author: Sara Wohldmann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So very soft!
items.body: I have honestly never experienced a night gown as soft and comfortable as this one! The fabric feels like a gentle cloud against my skin, making every night feel like a luxurious retreat. The fit is perfect—so cozy yet flattering—and it washes beautifully without losing its softness. I can't imagine ever settling for anything else. Truly the softest night gown I've ever known. Highly recommend to anyone looking for ultimate comfort and quality! Read more
items.author: Kljohnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: I’m 5’2” 135-140. I ordered a small and it was perfect. They fit nice. It’s soft and comfortable to lounge around in and sleep in. Read more
items.author: Miya Barber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamy nightgown
items.body: Style, color, fabric are lovely. The fabric is soft and delicate. This is the second night gown I purchased. Read more
items.author: lesongs2

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mid Grey, Tie Dye Blue, Dark Grey, Black White Flower, Black Leopard Print, Black, Orange Flower, Blue Flower, Black Pumpkin, White Flower, Light Blue Cherry Print, Black Starry Sky, Navy Flower, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
